member.name: T:SerilogWeb.Classic.ApplicationLifecycleModule
member.summary: HTTP module that logs application request and error events.

member.name: P:SerilogWeb.Classic.ApplicationLifecycleModule.Logger
member.summary: The globally-shared logger.

member.name: M:SerilogWeb.Classic.ApplicationLifecycleModule.Register
member.summary: Register the module with the application (called automatically; do not call this explicitly from your code).

member.name: P:SerilogWeb.Classic.ApplicationLifecycleModule.LogPostedFormData
member.summary: When set to Always, form data will be written via an event (using severity from FormDataLoggingLevel). When set to OnlyOnError, this will only be written if the Response has a 500 status. The default is Never. Requires that is also true (which it is, by default).

member.name: P:SerilogWeb.Classic.ApplicationLifecycleModule.FilterPasswordsInFormData
member.summary: When set to true (the default), any field containing password will not have its value logged when DebugLogPostedFormData is enabled

member.name: P:SerilogWeb.Classic.ApplicationLifecycleModule.FilteredKeywordsInFormData
member.summary: When FilterPasswordsInFormData is true, any field containing keywords in this list will not have its value logged when DebugLogPostedFormData is enabled

member.name: P:SerilogWeb.Classic.ApplicationLifecycleModule.IsEnabled
member.summary: When set to true, request details and errors will be logged. The default is true.

member.name: P:SerilogWeb.Classic.ApplicationLifecycleModule.RequestLoggingLevel
member.summary: The level at which to log HTTP requests. The default is Information.

member.name: P:SerilogWeb.Classic.ApplicationLifecycleModule.FormDataLoggingLevel
member.summary: The level at which to log form values

member.name: M:SerilogWeb.Classic.ApplicationLifecycleModule.Init(System.Web.HttpApplication)
member.summary: Initializes a module and prepares it to handle requests.
member.param: An that provides access to the methods, properties, and events common to all application objects within an ASP.NET application

member.name: M:SerilogWeb.Classic.ApplicationLifecycleModule.FilterPasswords(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Filters configured keywords from being logged
member.param: Key of the pair
Value of the pair

member.name: M:SerilogWeb.Classic.ApplicationLifecycleModule.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes of the resources (other than memory) used by the module that implements .

member.name: T:SerilogWeb.Classic.Enrichers.HttpContextCurrent
member.summary: This helper class is used to handle special case introduced by ASP.NET integrated pipeline when HttpContextCurrent.Request may throw instead of returning null.

member.name: P:SerilogWeb.Classic.Enrichers.HttpContextCurrent.Request
member.summary: Gets the object for the current HTTP request.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this enricher will check for possible HTTP proxies via X-FORWARDED-FOR headers.
member.value: true if [check for HTTP proxies]; otherwise, false.

member.param: if set to true this Enricher also checks for HTTP proxies and their X-FORWARDED-FOR header.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The anonymous username. Leave null if you do not want to use anonymous user names. By default it is (anonymous).

member.name: T:SerilogWeb.Classic.LogPostedFormDataOption
member.summary: Describes options for logging form request data

member.name: F:SerilogWeb.Classic.LogPostedFormDataOption.Never
member.summary: Posted form values are never logged

member.name: F:SerilogWeb.Classic.LogPostedFormDataOption.Always
member.summary: Posted form values are always logged

member.name: F:SerilogWeb.Classic.LogPostedFormDataOption.OnlyOnError
member.summary: Posted form values are logged if Response.StatusCode >= 500
